paper_metadata.title: The designation of national-level poverty-stricken counties constitutes a pivotal policy within China's targeted poverty alleviation strategy

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: Results indicate that the targeted poverty alleviation policy exerts no significant impact on regional cyclical fluctuations but significantly amplifies the trend component associated with economic growth
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: Utilizing county-level panel data from 2000 to 2021, we apply the Hodrick-Prescott (H-P) filter method to decompose economic output into trend and cyclical components. Subsequently, the Propensity Score Matching-Difference-in-Differences (PSM-DID) method is used

evidence_citations.program_name_citation: In March 2012, the State Council Leading Group on Poverty Alleviation and Development released a new list of national-level poverty-stricken counties
evidence_citations.country_citation: The Chinese government has consistently prioritized economic development and poverty alleviation
evidence_citations.target_population_citation: Subsequently, in 2014, the list was further refined to include 832 national-level poverty-stricken counties
